summary: A professor with the psychic ability to communicate with the dead uses his powers on his pet cat in order to take vengeance upon his enemies.
cast: Patrick Magee|Mimsy Farmer|David Warbeck|Al Cliver|Dagmar Lassander|Bruno Corazzari|Geoffrey Copleston|Daniela Doria|Lucio Fulci|Vito Passeri
title: El gato negro
